generated_text:
{
    "title": "Chicken Alfredo",
    "serving_size": 4,
    "ingredients": {
        "Chicken Breast": "2 lbs",
        "Flour": "1/2 cup",
        "Salt": "1 tsp",
        "Black Pepper": "1 tsp",
        "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
        "Garlic": "4 cloves, minced",
        "Heavy Cream": "2 cups",
        "Parmesan Cheese": "1 cup, grated",
        "Butter": "4 tbsp",
        "Fettuccine Pasta": "1 lb",
        "Salt": "1 tsp",
        "Black Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
        "Parsley": "2 tbsp, chopped for garnish"
    },
    "instructions": {
        "1": "In a shallow dish, mix the flour, salt, and pepper. Dredge the chicken breasts in the flour mixture.",
        "2": "In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Cook the chicken breasts until golden brown and no longer pink inside. Remove from skillet and set aside.",
        "3": "In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and butter. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is creamy.",
        "4": "Cook the fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and add to the skillet with the Alfredo sauce. Toss to coat the pasta.",
        "5": "Slice the cooked chicken breasts and arrange them on top of the pasta. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving."
    }
}
